Package hr.fer.oop.lab3

Class FootballPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.oop.lab3.Person
      • hr.fer.oop.lab3.FootballPlayer
  • public class FootballPlayer
extends Person
    This class represents a football player, his name, representing country and emotion level inherited from Person, with an addition of his playing skill level and playing position.
    Author:
    Matija

    • Constructor Detail

      • FootballPlayer

        public FootballPlayer​(String name,
                      String country,
                      int emotion,
                      int playingSkill,
                      PlayingPosition playingPosition)
        Constructs a new instance of type FootballPlayer. Variables name, country and emotion cannot be changed after calling this constructor. Variables playing skill and playing position can be altered by calling their 'set' methods later.
        Parameters:
        name - player's name
        country - player's coutry
        emotion - player's emotion level
        playingSkill - player's playing skill level
        playingPosition - player's playing position

      • FootballPlayer

        public FootballPlayer()
        Constructs a new instance of type FootballPlayer.

    • Method Detail

      • getPlayingSkill

        public int getPlayingSkill()
        Returns the player's playing skill level.
        Returns:
        player's playing skill level in range [1-100]

      • setPlayingSkill

        public void setPlayingSkill​(int playingSkill)
        Sets the player's playing skill level. Value must be in range [1-100] otherwise it will be set to its default value stated in Constants.
        Parameters:
        playingSkill - playing skill level in range [1-100]

      • getPlayingPosition

        public PlayingPosition getPlayingPosition()
        Return the player's playing position (GK/DF/MF/FW).
        Returns:
        player's playing position

      • setPlayingPosition

        public void setPlayingPosition​(PlayingPosition playingPosition)
        Sets the player's playing position (GK/DF/MF/FW).
        Parameters:
        playingPosition - player's playing position
